reviewtext: As far as palm pilots go, this is a 5, unless you want color.  Palm is popular and easy to use, so there are plenty of programs for it.  Grafiti, the custom writing style, is good, but difficult for me due to poor fine-motor skills.  As such, a few letters require several repeats to get.  My wife is much better with the writing portion than I am.  I primarily use this for reminders, phonebook and notes.  Side use is multi-clocks for travelling, and various video games.
